title: line_item
description: A line item for a document

position.description: Required since items are sorted by position.

price_single.description: Net price of a single item

tax.description: Tax percent for a single item.

discount.description: Discount in percent applied to the items net total

product_id.description: An item can reference a product by its uuid. See use_product

use_product.description: If set and product_id is present, the products name, description, quantity, unit, price are copied if the according item fields are missing.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.
